Focus Time.Title: Focus time
Focus Time.p1: You can use focus time for all kinds of school work such as homework and exam preparation.
Focus Time.p2: It is based on the “Pomodoro Technique” and helps you get done your school work in a more focused and uninterrupted manner.

Study Diary.Title: Study diary
Study Diary.p1: The study diary is for tracking your homework and upcoming exams. It gives you more structure for your everyday school life since you will have a better overview of your tasks and can get them done more effectively.
